markdownRemark.html: Located in a strategic point of the southern Sevillian district. Right in front of the Entreolivos Promotion School, one minute from Montequinto, S-30, Bellavista and Bermejales. The facilities include - 14 tennis courts, 2 padel courts, changing rooms, showers and services, a restaurant and terrace, area for children, soccer field and basketball pitch.

frontmatter.title: Club de Tenis Bellavista S.L.
